text: Grindstone Creek is a stream in Boone County in the U.S. state of Missouri. It is a tributary of Hinkson Creek. Grindstone Creek was named for the deposits of rock along its course which were the source of grindstones. Grindstone Parkway, a major road in Columbia, Missouri, is named after the creek. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Boone County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri Category:Geography of Columbia, Missouri
title: Grindstone Creek (Hinkson Creek tributary)
